description: Well, here's another game that EA will be breaking on Steam Deck / Linux, with EA anticheat rolling out to EA SPORTS WRC when it goes live in June.
title: EA SPORTS WRC is adding EA anticheat, breaking another game on Steam Deck / Linux

description: Proton Experimental was updated today by Valve for Steam Deck / Linux PCs which includes some more improvements for gaming.
title: Proton Experimental improves Halo Infinite, Call of Juarez: Gunslinger and more

description: Available now in Early Access is Seablip, an open world pirate adventure with a cute style to it from solo developer Jardar Solli and it comes with Native Linux support.
title: Cute open world pirate adventure Seablip is out now on Steam

description: The OrangePi Neo is an upcoming gaming handheld powered by Manjaro Linux Gaming Edition, and now we have some rough demo footage of a prototype actually playing games.
title: Manjaro Linux devs show off the OrangePi Neo prototype handheld with gameplay

description: Summer is one the way and with things heating up a bit, perhaps you want a little more control over your system cooling wrapped up in a neat interface? CoolerControl has the right idea.
title: Check out CoolerControl, a feature-rich cooling-device control application for Linux

description: Soulstone Survivors, easily one of the best action roguelite horde-survival bullet heaven games (hi Vampire Survivors), has a new major update out with a suspiciously Deep Rock Galactic looking Dwarf in it.
title: Soulstone Survivors has a new character that looks suspiciously from Deep Rock Galactic

description: It's free game Friday! The sun is out shining so what a great day to sit inside and play some games to keep cool. Even cooler is that they're free to keep.
title: ENDLESS Legend, 100% Orange Juice and Dragon Age: Inquisition are free to keeps

description: Valve released another two updates recently. The first is SteamOS 3.6.3 Preview for Steam Deck continuing to fix up issues, and a stable Steam Client Update for desktop PCs and Steam Deck.
title: SteamOS 3.6.3 Preview for Steam Deck up, plus a new stable Steam Client Update for all
